query:
SELECT 
  brand,
  COUNT(*) as total_products,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND description != '' THEN 1 END) as with_description,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN description IS NULL OR description = '' THEN 1 END) as without_description,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN specifications IS NOT NULL AND specifications != '{}' THEN 1 END) as with_specs
FROM products
WHERE brand IN ('Restek', 'Merck', 'Sigma-Aldrich', 'Supelco', 'Avantor')
GROUP BY brand
ORDER BY total_products DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3oR8r6zhvNA54kM.root --database 7P2s8YLp8Q4WBmq2Lyj4MG --execute SELECT 
  brand,
  COUNT(*) as total_products,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND description != '' THEN 1 END) as with_description,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN description IS NULL OR description = '' THEN 1 END) as without_description,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN specifications IS NOT NULL AND specifications != '{}' THEN 1 END) as with_specs
FROM products
WHERE brand IN ('Restek', 'Merck', 'Sigma-Aldrich', 'Supelco', 'Avantor')
GROUP BY brand
ORDER BY total_products DESC;
